Text: can someone confirm if this game is in english or not???
It in Russian yazyke.A sound in English

gives error when running setup.exe-


filename, volume name or directory name is incorrect....


why??

Works....
just need to rename the folder(to anything)...


language is in Russian...
but can be easily changed to English by editing the context.xml file..

open it in notepad and change 
language="russia"
to "english"

Thanks for the upload  SeregA_Lus..


and the Game is great too....
